node.title: Chinese exchange student drowns while snorkelling in Tasmania
node.alt: Lighthouse Bay with a lighthouse in distance.
node.description: A boy who drowned while snorkelling with friends in Tasmania is identified as a Chinese exchange student.
node.content: ["A boy who drowned while snorkelling in Tasmania has been identified as a Chinese exchange student.", "Tasmania Police said the boy was swimming at South Bruny near Lighthouse Bay on Sunday afternoon when emergency services were alerted.", "Police and ambulance stationed on Bruny Island as well as the rescue helicopter responded to the incident, but the boy could not be resuscitated, police said.", "On Monday, the principal at Taroona High School Matt Bennell emailed the school community that Year 10 student\u00a0Rui Xuan Han, also known as Harry Han, had died\u00a0while \"snorkelling with friends on the weekend\".", "In the email, Mr Bennell said the school had \"support structures in place to help your child\u00a0cope with this tragedy should it be required\".", "He urged parents of students at the school to \"please keep an eye\u00a0on your child and allow them to express their feelings without criticism\".", "Mr Bennell advised parents to exercise\u00a0caution over students'\u00a0use of social media in the wake of the tragedy.", "\"Young people frequently turn to social media to see what others are saying, or\u00a0to find out more. At these times it is important that you monitor their use and engage with them about what\u00a0they read,\" he said.", "Mr Bennell wrote the school community at Taroona \"all\u00a0know the\u00a0value of our international students who bring such valuable diversity to our school community\".", "\"I, like you, will\u00a0be thinking of Rui Xuan's family and friends during this tragic and difficult time,\" he wrote.", "Police said a\u00a0report would be prepared for the coroner."]
